column2: "Hyɛ bosoom Abib nsew
column3: na dzi apaho no ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn; na bosoom Abib mu na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn yii wo wɔ Egypt anadwe."

column2: "Na bɔ apaho okum afɔr no ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn
column4: wɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE bɛsan mu eyi dɛ ne dzin ntsena hɔ no."

column2: "Mma mmfa mbɔrkaw boodoo nnka ho nndzi; nda esuon na fa epitsi boodoo ka ho dzi
column3: mekyerɛ amandzehu boodoo no; osiandɛ ɔhar mu na ifiir edzi fii Egypt asaase do: ama aakaa da a edze fiir edzi fii Egypt asaase do no wo nkwa nda nyinara."

column2: "Na mma wonnhu wo nkyɛn mbɔrkaw wɔ w’ahe nyinara do nda esuon; nkyii so mma nam a iku hɔn da a odzi kan ewimbir no bi nnka anadwe no nyinara mma onnkodu anapa."
"Mma nnku apaho no wɔ wo kuropon a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no biara mu:"
"gyedɛ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi dɛ ne dzin ntsena hɔ no
column3: hɔ na ku apaho no ewimbir
column5: wɔ wo Egypt fi aber no mu."

column2: "Na toto na dzi no wɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi no: na anapa no san
"Nda esia na dzi epitsi boodoo: na da a otsia esuon no nyɛ asomdwee nguabɔ mma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn; mma nnyɛ edwuma wɔ mu."
"Adapɛn esuon na kan ma woho: da a erehyɛ ase dze kantankrankye aka eburow a osisi hɔ no na fi kan adapɛn esuon."
"Na hyɛ adapɛn afahyɛ no ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn fa ka wo nsa mu ayamuyi afɔr ntoboa a edze rema no no ho
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ehyira wo no:"

column2: "na ma w’enyi ngye wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim
column8: nye Levinyi a ɔwɔ wo kuropon mu
column11: nye okunafo a wɔwɔ wo mu
column12: wɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi dɛ ne dzin ntsena hɔ no."

column2: "Na kaa dɛ eyɛɛ akowaa wɔ Egypt: na dwen do yɛ ahyɛdze yi."
"Hyɛ ntamadan afahyɛ nda esuon
column3: aber a aboaboa w’ewuporoweebea do nye wo wenyintwer mu adze ano no:"

column2: "na ma w’enyi ngye wɔ w’afahyɛ no mu
column11: nye okunafo a wɔwɔ wo kuropon mu."

column2: "Nda esuon na hyɛ fa ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn wɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE bɛsan mu eyi no: osiandɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn behyira wo wɔ wo ndɔbaa nyinara mu
column3: na wo nsaano edwuma nyinara mu

column2: "Afrenhyia kor mu mpɛn ebiasa na wo mbanyin nyinara nkefir EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim wɔ beebi mbrɛ ɔbɛsan mu eyi no; wɔ epitsi boodoo afahyɛ no mu
column4: nye ntamadan afahyɛ no mu: na mma wɔmmfa nsapan mmbefir EWURADZE enyim:"

column2: "nyimpa biara mma dza obotum
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn nhyira a ɔdze ehyira wo no tse."

column2: "Hyɛ ntsɛmbuafo nye mpanyimfo wɔ wo nkuropon a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ mbrɛ w’ebusuakuw tsetsee nyinara mu: na wɔmfa ntsɛn tsenenee mbu ɔman no ntsɛn."
"Mma nndan atsɛmbu enyi; mma mmfɛr nyimpa: nkyii so mma nngye akyɛdze; na akyɛdze fura enyansafo enyi
"Dza ɔtsen ara na dzi ekyir
column4: na eenya asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no edzi."

column2: "Mma nntsɛw dua biara mmfa nnyɛ abosompɔw Asera wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn afɔrmbukyia a ebɛyɛ ama woho no nkyɛn."
"Nkyii so mma nnsi dum a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn kyir mma woho."
